wikipedia_page.main: Robert Edward Gibson (12 May 1926 in Felpham - 23 December 2008) was a British geotechnical engineer. He is best known for his research into soil properties for foundation design. A simplified soil model, Gibson soil is named after him.

response: * Robert Gibson, Lord Gibson (1886–1965), British Labour Party politician, MP
* Professor Robert Gibson – Emeritus Professor of Engineering Science, King's College, London
